f12854.value: Sociedade Gestora de Participações Sociais, S.A.

f12856.value: Av. D. João II, 34, Parque das Nações, 1998-031 Lisbon

f12882.value: Novabase's activity is aggregated into 2 operating segments:(i) Next-Gen (NG) - This area, which operates under the Celfocus commercial brand according to Novabase's new brand architecture, develops activities of IT consulting and services with technology offerings that tend to be more advanced and targeted mainly to the Financial Services (Banks, Insurance and Capital Markets) and Telecommunications (Operators) industries, and to the most competitive markets (Europe and Middle East);(ii) Value Portfolio (VP) - This area of Novabase, where the Neotalent commercial brand operates, develops activities of IT consulting and services of IT Staffing. It also develops a venture capital activity through Novabase Capital, S.C.R., S.A..
